1.name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
1.description: Fighters are proficient with all simple and martial weapons. Fighters are also proficient with all types of armor and shields.

1.name: Bravery
1.description: + 1 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. This bonus increases by +1 for every four levels beyond 1st.

1.name: Bonus Combat Feat
1.description: At 1st level and every even level thereafter, a fighter gains a bonus feat in addition to the feat that any character of that level receives and the bonus feat granted to a human at 1st level. These bonus feats must be taken from the list of combat feats. A fighter must meet the prerequisites of the selected feat to use it.

2.name: Bravery
2.description: +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear.

2.name: Bonus Combat Feat
2.description: At 2nd level, a fighter gains another bonus combat feat.

3.name: Bravery
3.description: +3 morale bonus on saving throws against fear.

3.name: Armor Training
3.description: Starting at 3rd level, a fighter learns to be more maneuverable while wearing armor. Whenever he is wearing armor, he reduces the armor check penalty by 1 (to a minimum of 0) and increases the maximum Dexterity bonus allowed by the armor by 1. The benefits of armor training are cumulative.

4.name: Bravery
4.description: +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear.

4.name: Bonus Combat Feat
4.description: At 4th level, a fighter gains another bonus combat feat.

5.name: Bravery
5.description: +5 morale bonus on saving throws against fear.

5.name: Weapon Training
5.description: Starting at 5th level, a fighter can select one group of weapons, as noted below. Whenever he attacks with a weapon from this group, he can use his Strength modifier instead of Dexterity for attack rolls and his Strength modifier instead of Dexterity for damage rolls when using a melee weapon in this group, but not when using a ranged weapon. The benefits of weapon training are cumulative.
5.selectionLabel: Select a weapon group for training

6.name: Bravery
6.description: +6 morale bonus on saving throws against fear.

6.name: Armor Training
6.description: At 6th level, the improvement from armor training increases to +2 AC and +2 Dexterity bonus.

6.name: Bonus Combat Feat
6.description: At 6th level, a fighter gains another bonus combat feat.
